00035 static void death(int sig) {
00036 
00037     cerr << endl << "====> Module is dying due to " 
00038          << ( sig == SIGPIPE ? "SIGPIPE" :
00039               sig == SIGABRT ? "SIGABRT" :
00040               sig == SIGSEGV ? "SIGSEGV" :
00041               sig == SIGBUS ? "SIGBUS" :
00042               sig == SIGILL ? "SIGILL" :
00043               sig == SIGFPE ? "SIGFPE" : 
00044               "Unknown Signal" )
00045          << " <====";
00046 
00047     if ( (!getenv("MINET_DISPLAY")) || 
00048          (strcasecmp(getenv("MINET_DISPLAY"),"xterm") == 0) ) {
00049         char junk[80];
00050 
00051         cerr << endl << "Hit enter to continue" << endl;
00052         fgets(junk, 80, stdin);
00053         exit(-1);
00054     }
00055 }

00182 
00183 void MinetEvent::Serialize(const int fd) const {
00184     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&eventtype, sizeof(eventtype)) != sizeof(eventtype)) {
00185         throw SerializationException();
00186     }
00187 
00188     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&direction, sizeof(direction)) != sizeof(direction)) {
00189         throw SerializationException();
00190     }
00191     
00192     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&handle, sizeof(handle)) != sizeof(handle)) {
00193         throw SerializationException();
00194     }
00195     
00196     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&error, sizeof(error)) != sizeof(error)) {
00197         throw SerializationException();
00198     }
00199     
00200     if (writeall(fd, (const char *)&overtime, sizeof(overtime)) != sizeof(overtime)) {
00201         throw SerializationException();
00202     }
00203 }
00204 
00205 void MinetEvent::Unserialize(const int fd) {
00206     if (readall(fd, (char *)&eventtype, sizeof(eventtype)) != sizeof(eventtype)) {
00207         throw SerializationException();
00208     }
00209 
00210     if (readall(fd, (char *)&direction, sizeof(direction)) != sizeof(direction)) {
00211         throw SerializationException();
00212     }
00213 
00214     if (readall(fd, (char *)&handle, sizeof(handle)) != sizeof(handle)) {
00215         throw SerializationException();
00216     }
00217 
00218     if (readall(fd, (char *)&error, sizeof(error)) != sizeof(error)) {
00219         throw SerializationException();
00220     }
00221 
00222     if (readall(fd, (char *)&overtime, sizeof(overtime)) != sizeof(overtime)) {
00223         throw SerializationException();
00224     }
00225 }

00227 
00228 std::ostream & MinetEvent::Print(std::ostream &os) const {
00229     os << "MinetEvent(eventtype="
00230        << ( (eventtype == Dataflow)  ? "Dataflow" :
00231             (eventtype == Exception) ? "Exception" :
00232             (eventtype == Timeout)   ? "Timeout" :
00233             (eventtype == Error)     ? "Error" : 
00234             "UNKNOWN" )
00235        << ", direction="
00236        << ( (direction == IN)    ? "IN" :
00237             (direction == OUT)   ? "OUT" :
00238             (direction == INOUT) ? "INOUT" :
00239             (direction == NONE)  ? "NONE" : 
00240             "UNKNOWN" )
00241        << ", handle=" << handle
00242        << ", error=" << error
00243        << ", overtime=" << overtime
00244        << ")";
00245     return os;
00246 }

00251 struct FifoData {
00252     MinetHandle handle;
00253     MinetModule module;
00254     int         from;
00255     int         to;
00256 };
00257 
00258 class Fifos : public std::deque<FifoData> {
00259 public:
00260     Fifos() : std::deque<FifoData>() {
00261         clear();
00262     }
00263 
00264     virtual ~Fifos() {
00265         clear();
00266     }
00267 
00268     iterator FindMatching(const MinetHandle handle) {
00269         for (iterator x = begin(); x != end(); ++x) {
00270             if ((*x).handle == handle) {
00271                 return x;
00272             }
00273         }
00274         return end();
00275     }
00276 };

00284 MinetHandle MinetGetNextHandle() {
00285     return MyNextHandle++;

00289 const char * MinetGetMonitorFifoName(const MinetModule &mod) {
00290 #if MONITOR
00291     const char * env = getenv("MINET_MONITOR");
00292     const char * mf = 0;
00293 
00294     if (env != 0) {
00295         switch (mod) {
00296             case MINET_MONITOR:
00297                 break;
00298             case MINET_READER:
00299                 mf = (strstr(env, "reader") != 0) ? reader2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00300                 break;
00301             case MINET_WRITER:
00302                 mf = (strstr(env, "writer") != 0) ? writer2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00303                 break;
00304             case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00305                 mf = (strstr(env, "device_driver") != 0) ? ether2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00306                 break;
00307             case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00308                 mf = (strstr(env, "ethernet_mux") != 0) ? ethermux2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00309                 break;
00310             case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00311                 mf = (strstr(env, "ip_module") != 0) ? ip2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00312                 break;
00313             case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00314                 mf = (strstr(env, "arp_module") != 0) ? arp2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00315                 break;
00316             case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00317                 mf = (strstr(env, "other_module") != 0) ? other2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00318                 break;
00319             case MINET_IP_MUX:
00320                 mf = (strstr(env, "ip_mux") != 0) ? ipmux2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00321                 break;
00322             case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00323                 mf = (strstr(env, "ipother_module") != 0) ? ipother2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00324                 break;
00325             case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00326                 mf = (strstr(env, "icmp_module") != 0) ? icmp2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00327                 break;
00328             case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00329                 mf = (strstr(env, "udp_module") != 0) ? udp2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00330                 break;
00331             case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00332                 mf = (strstr(env, "tcp_module") != 0) ? tcp2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00333                 break;
00334             case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00335                 mf = (strstr(env, "sock_module") != 0) ? sock2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00336                 break;
00337             case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00338                 mf = (strstr(env, "socklib_module") != 0) ? socklib2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00339                 break;
00340             case MINET_APP:
00341                 mf = (strstr(env, "app") != 0) ? app2mon_fifo_name : 0;
00342                 break;
00343             case MINET_DEFAULT:
00344             default:
00345                 mf = 0;
00346                 break;
00347         }
00348 
00349         return mf;
00350     } else {
00351         return 0;
00352     }
00353 #else
00354     return 0;
00355 #endif
00356 }

00358 bool        MinetIsModuleMonitored(const MinetModule &mod)
00359 {
00360     return MinetGetMonitorFifoName(mod)!=0;
00361 }
00362 
00363 
00364 int         MinetInit(const MinetModule &mod)
00365 {
00366 
00367     debug(5) << "Calling MinetInit() for module " << mod << endl;
00368 
00369     assert(MyModuleType==MINET_DEFAULT);
00370     MyModuleType=mod;
00371     MyFifos.clear();
00372     MyNextHandle=0;
00373     MyMonitorFifo=-1;
00374 
00375 
00376     signal(SIGPIPE,death);
00377     signal(SIGABRT,death);
00378     signal(SIGSEGV,death);
00379     signal(SIGBUS,death);
00380     signal(SIGILL,death);
00381     signal(SIGFPE,death);
00382 
00383 
00384 #if MONITOR
00385     const char *mf=MinetGetMonitorFifoName(mod);
00386 
00387     if (mf!=0)
00388     {
00389         debug(5) << tab << "In MinetInit(): Opening fifo as write-only: " << mf << endl;
00390 
00391         if ((MyMonitorFifo=open(mf,O_WRONLY))<0)
00392         {
00393             debug(3) << tab << "In MinetInit(): Error: Module " << mod << " can't connect to monitor! Check that the monitor is running." << endl;
00394         }
00395         else
00396         {
00397             debug(5) << tab << "In MinetInit(): Connected to monitor successfully." << endl;
00398         }
00399     }
00400 #endif
00401 
00402     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
00403 
00404     desc.timestamp=Time();
00405     desc.source=MyModuleType;
00406     desc.from=MyModuleType;
00407     desc.to=MyModuleType;
00408     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
00409     desc.optype=MINET_INIT;
00410 
00411     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
00412 
00413     return 0;
00414 }
00415 
00416 int         MinetDeinit()
00417 {
00418     assert(MyModuleType!=MINET_DEFAULT);
00419     MyModuleType=MINET_DEFAULT;
00420     MyFifos.clear();
00421     MyNextHandle=0;
00422 
00423     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
00424 
00425     desc.timestamp=Time();
00426     desc.from=MyModuleType;
00427     desc.to=MyModuleType;
00428     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
00429     desc.optype=MINET_DEINIT;
00430 
00431     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
00432 
00433     if (MyMonitorFifo>0)
00434     {
00435         close(MyMonitorFifo);
00436         MyMonitorFifo=-1;
00437     }
00438     return 0;
00439 }

00441 bool        MinetIsModuleInConfig(const MinetModule &mod)
00442 {
00443     char *env = getenv("MINET_MODULES");
00444 
00445     if (env!=0)
00446     {
00447         switch (mod)
00448         {
00449         case MINET_MONITOR:
00450             return 0!=strstr(env,"monitor");
00451             break;
00452         case MINET_READER:
00453             return 0!=strstr(env,"reader");
00454             break;
00455         case MINET_WRITER:
00456             return 0!=strstr(env,"writer");
00457             break;
00458         case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00459             return 0!=strstr(env,"device_driver");
00460             break;
00461         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00462             return 0!=strstr(env,"ethernet_mux");
00463             break;
00464         case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00465             return 0!=strstr(env,"ip_module");
00466             break;
00467         case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00468             return 0!=strstr(env,"arp_module");
00469             break;
00470         case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00471             return 0!=strstr(env,"other_module");
00472             break;
00473         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00474             return 0!=strstr(env,"ip_mux");
00475             break;
00476         case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00477             return 0!=strstr(env,"ipother_module");
00478             break;
00479         case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00480             return 0!=strstr(env,"icmp_module");
00481             break;
00482         case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00483             return 0!=strstr(env,"udp_module");
00484             break;
00485         case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00486             return 0!=strstr(env,"tcp_module");
00487             break;
00488         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00489             return 0!=strstr(env,"sock_module");
00490             break;
00491         case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00492             return 0!=strstr(env,"socklib_module");
00493             break;
00494         case MINET_APP:
00495             return 0!=strstr(env,"app");
00496             break;
00497         case MINET_DEFAULT:
00498             return false;
00499         default:
00500             return false;
00501             break;
00502         }
00503     }
00504     else
00505     {
00506         return false;
00507     }
00508 }
00509 
00510 
00511 MinetHandle MinetConnect(const MinetModule &mod)
00512 {
00513     const char *fifoto;
00514     const char *fifofrom;
00515 
00516     switch (MyModuleType)
00517     {
00518     case MINET_MONITOR:
00519         switch (mod)
00520         {
00521             // Monitors only do accepts
00522         default:
00523             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00524             break;
00525         }
00526         break;
00527     case MINET_READER:
00528         // Readers still use their internal protocol
00529         Die("Invalid Connect");
00530         break;
00531     case MINET_WRITER:
00532         // Writers still use their internal protocol
00533         Die("Invalid Connect");
00534         break;
00535     case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00536         // Device drivers do no do active connects
00537         Die("Invalid Connect.");
00538         break;
00539     case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00540         // active connect to dd, passive connects to several others.
00541         switch (mod)
00542         {
00543         case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00544             fifoto=mux2ether_fifo_name;
00545             fifofrom=ether2mux_fifo_name;
00546             break;
00547         default:
00548             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00549             break;
00550         }
00551         break;
00552     case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00553         // active to ethermux and arp module, passive to ip mux
00554         switch (mod)
00555         {
00556         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00557             fifoto=ip2mux_fifo_name;
00558             fifofrom=mux2ip_fifo_name;
00559             break;
00560         case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00561             fifoto=ip2arp_fifo_name;
00562             fifofrom=arp2ip_fifo_name;
00563             break;
00564         default:
00565             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00566             break;
00567         }
00568         break;
00569     case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00570         // active to ethermux, passive to ip
00571         switch (mod)
00572         {
00573         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00574             fifoto=arp2mux_fifo_name;
00575             fifofrom=mux2arp_fifo_name;
00576             break;
00577         default:
00578             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00579             break;
00580         }
00581         break;
00582     case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00583         // active to ethermux
00584         switch (mod)
00585         {
00586         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00587             fifoto=other2mux_fifo_name;
00588             fifofrom=mux2other_fifo_name;
00589             break;
00590         default:
00591             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00592             break;
00593         }
00594         break;
00595     case MINET_IP_MUX:
00596         // active to ip module, passive others
00597         switch (mod)
00598         {
00599         case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00600             fifoto=ipmux2ip_fifo_name;
00601             fifofrom=ip2ipmux_fifo_name;
00602             break;
00603         default:
00604             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00605             break;
00606         }
00607         break;
00608     case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00609         // active to ip mux, passive to sock
00610         switch (mod)
00611         {
00612         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00613             fifoto=icmp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00614             fifofrom=ipmux2icmp_fifo_name;
00615             break;
00616         default:
00617             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00618             break;
00619         }
00620         break;
00621     case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00622         // active to ip mux, passive to sock
00623         switch (mod)
00624         {
00625         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00626             fifoto=udp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00627             fifofrom=ipmux2udp_fifo_name;
00628             break;
00629         default:
00630             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00631             break;
00632         }
00633         break;
00634     case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00635         // active to ipmux, passive to sock
00636         switch (mod)
00637         {
00638         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00639             fifoto=tcp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00640             fifofrom=ipmux2tcp_fifo_name;
00641             break;
00642         default:
00643             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00644             break;
00645         }
00646         break;
00647     case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00648         // active to ip mux, passive to sock
00649         switch (mod)
00650         {
00651         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00652             fifoto=other2ipmux_fifo_name;
00653             fifofrom=ipmux2other_fifo_name;
00654             break;
00655         default:
00656             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00657             break;
00658         }
00659         break;
00660     case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00661         // active to icmp, udp, tcp, ipother, and other, passive to socklib module
00662         switch (mod)
00663         {
00664         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00665         case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00666             Die("Connect type unimplemented.");
00667             break;
00668         case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00669             fifoto=sock2ipother_fifo_name;
00670             fifofrom=ipother2sock_fifo_name;
00671             break;
00672         case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00673             fifoto=sock2icmp_fifo_name;
00674             fifofrom=icmp2sock_fifo_name;
00675             break;
00676         case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00677             fifoto=sock2udp_fifo_name;
00678             fifofrom=udp2sock_fifo_name;
00679             break;
00680         case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00681             fifoto=sock2tcp_fifo_name;
00682             fifofrom=tcp2sock_fifo_name;
00683             break;
00684         default:
00685             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00686             break;
00687         }
00688         break;
00689     case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00690     case MINET_APP:
00691         switch (mod)
00692         {
00693         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00694             fifoto=socklib2sock_fifo_name;
00695             fifofrom=sock2socklib_fifo_name;
00696             break;
00697         default:
00698             Die("Invalid Connect.");
00699             break;
00700         }
00701         break;
00702     case MINET_DEFAULT:
00703     default:
00704         Die("Unknown module!");
00705     }
00706 
00707     FifoData con;
00708     con.handle=MinetGetNextHandle();
00709     con.module=mod;
00710 
00711     con.from = fifofrom!=0 ? open(fifofrom,O_RDONLY) : -1;
00712     con.to = fifoto!=0 ? open(fifoto,O_WRONLY) : -1;
00713 
00714     MyFifos.push_back(con);
00715 
00716     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
00717 
00718     desc.timestamp=Time();
00719     desc.source=MyModuleType;
00720     desc.from=MyModuleType;
00721     desc.to=mod;
00722     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
00723     desc.optype=MINET_CONNECT;
00724 
00725     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
00726 
00727     return con.handle;
00728 }

00730 MinetHandle MinetAccept(const MinetModule &mod)
00731 {
00732 
00733     debug(5) << "Calling MinetAccept() for module " << mod << endl;
00734 
00735     const char *fifofrom, *fifoto;
00736 
00737     switch (MyModuleType)
00738     {
00739     case MINET_MONITOR:
00740         switch (mod)
00741         {
00742         case MINET_READER:
00743             fifofrom=reader2mon_fifo_name;
00744             fifoto=0;
00745             break;
00746         case MINET_WRITER:
00747             fifofrom=writer2mon_fifo_name;
00748             fifoto=0;
00749             break;
00750         case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00751             fifofrom=ether2mon_fifo_name;
00752             fifoto=0;
00753             break;
00754         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00755             fifofrom=ethermux2mon_fifo_name;
00756             fifoto=0;
00757             break;
00758         case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00759             fifofrom=arp2mon_fifo_name;
00760             fifoto=0;
00761             break;
00762         case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00763             fifofrom=ip2mon_fifo_name;
00764             fifoto=0;
00765             break;
00766         case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00767             fifofrom=other2mon_fifo_name;
00768             fifoto=0;
00769             break;
00770         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00771             fifofrom=ipmux2mon_fifo_name;
00772             fifoto=0;
00773             break;
00774         case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00775             fifofrom=udp2mon_fifo_name;
00776             fifoto=0;
00777             break;
00778         case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00779             fifofrom=tcp2mon_fifo_name;
00780             fifoto=0;
00781             break;
00782         case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00783             fifofrom=icmp2mon_fifo_name;
00784             fifoto=0;
00785             break;
00786         case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00787             fifofrom=ipother2mon_fifo_name;
00788             fifoto=0;
00789             break;
00790         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00791             fifofrom=sock2mon_fifo_name;
00792             fifoto=0;
00793             break;
00794         case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00795             fifofrom=socklib2mon_fifo_name;
00796             fifoto=0;
00797             break;
00798         case MINET_APP:
00799             fifofrom=app2mon_fifo_name;
00800             fifoto=0;
00801             break;
00802         default:
00803             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00804             break;
00805         }
00806         break;
00807     case MINET_READER:
00808         Die("Invalid Accept");
00809         break;
00810     case MINET_WRITER:
00811         Die("Invalid Accept");
00812         break;
00813     case MINET_DEVICE_DRIVER:
00814         switch (mod)
00815         {
00816         case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00817             fifoto=ether2mux_fifo_name;
00818             fifofrom=mux2ether_fifo_name;
00819             break;
00820         default:
00821             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00822             break;
00823         }
00824         break;
00825     case MINET_ETHERNET_MUX:
00826         switch (mod)
00827         {
00828         case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00829             fifoto=mux2ip_fifo_name;
00830             fifofrom=ip2mux_fifo_name;
00831             break;
00832         case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00833             fifoto=mux2arp_fifo_name;
00834             fifofrom=arp2mux_fifo_name;
00835             break;
00836         case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00837             fifoto=mux2other_fifo_name;
00838             fifofrom=other2mux_fifo_name;
00839             break;
00840         default:
00841             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00842             break;
00843         }
00844         break;
00845     case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00846         switch (mod)
00847         {
00848         case MINET_IP_MUX:
00849             fifoto=ip2ipmux_fifo_name;
00850             fifofrom=ipmux2ip_fifo_name;
00851             break;
00852         default:
00853             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00854             break;
00855         }
00856         break;
00857     case MINET_ARP_MODULE:
00858         switch (mod)
00859         {
00860         case MINET_IP_MODULE:
00861             fifoto=arp2ip_fifo_name;
00862             fifofrom=ip2arp_fifo_name;
00863             break;
00864         default:
00865             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00866             break;
00867         }
00868         break;
00869     case MINET_OTHER_MODULE:
00870         // no passives
00871         Die("Invalid Accept.");
00872         break;
00873     case MINET_IP_MUX:
00874         switch (mod)
00875         {
00876         case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00877             fifoto=ipmux2icmp_fifo_name;
00878             fifofrom=icmp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00879             break;
00880         case MINET_UDP_MODULE:

00882             fifofrom=udp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00883             break;
00884         case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00885             fifoto=ipmux2tcp_fifo_name;
00886             fifofrom=tcp2ipmux_fifo_name;
00887             break;
00888         case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00889             fifoto=ipmux2other_fifo_name;
00890             fifofrom=other2ipmux_fifo_name;
00891             break;
00892         default:
00893             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00894             break;
00895         }
00896         break;
00897     case MINET_ICMP_MODULE:
00898         switch (mod)
00899         {
00900         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00901             fifoto=icmp2sock_fifo_name;
00902             fifofrom=sock2icmp_fifo_name;
00903             break;
00904         default:
00905             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00906             break;
00907         }
00908         break;
00909     case MINET_UDP_MODULE:
00910         switch (mod)
00911         {
00912         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00913             fifoto=udp2sock_fifo_name;
00914             fifofrom=sock2udp_fifo_name;
00915             break;
00916         default:
00917             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00918             break;
00919         }
00920         break;
00921     case MINET_TCP_MODULE:
00922         switch (mod)
00923         {
00924         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00925             fifoto=tcp2sock_fifo_name;
00926             fifofrom=sock2tcp_fifo_name;
00927             break;
00928         default:
00929             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00930             break;
00931         }
00932         break;
00933     case MINET_IP_OTHER_MODULE:
00934         switch (mod)
00935         {
00936         case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00937             fifoto=ipother2sock_fifo_name;
00938             fifofrom=sock2ipother_fifo_name;
00939             break;
00940         default:
00941             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00942             break;
00943         }
00944         break;
00945     case MINET_SOCK_MODULE:
00946         switch (mod)
00947         {
00948         case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00949         case MINET_APP:
00950             fifoto=sock2socklib_fifo_name;
00951             fifofrom=socklib2sock_fifo_name;
00952             break;
00953         default:
00954             Die("Invalid Accept.");
00955             break;
00956         }
00957         break;
00958     case MINET_SOCKLIB_MODULE:
00959     case MINET_APP:
00960         // no passives
00961         Die("Invalid Accept.");
00962         break;
00963     case MINET_DEFAULT:
00964     default:
00965         Die("Unknown module!");
00966     }
00967 
00968     debug(5) << tab << "In MinetAccept(): fifoto=" << fifoto << ", fifofrom=" << fifofrom << endl;
00969 
00970     FifoData con;
00971     con.handle=MinetGetNextHandle();
00972     con.module=mod;
00973 
00974     con.to= fifoto !=0 ? open(fifoto,O_WRONLY) : -1;
00975     con.from= fifofrom!=0 ? open(fifofrom,O_RDONLY) : -1 ;
00976 
00977     debug(5) << tab << "In MinetAccept(): returned from open()" << endl;
00978 
00979     MyFifos.push_back(con);
00980 
00981     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
00982 
00983     desc.timestamp=Time();
00984     desc.source=MyModuleType;
00985     desc.from=mod;
00986     desc.to=MyModuleType;
00987     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
00988     desc.optype=MINET_ACCEPT;
00989 
00990     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
00991 
00992     return con.handle;
00993 }

00995 
00996 int MinetAddExternalConnection(const int inputfd, const int outputfd)
00997 {
00998     FifoData con;
00999     con.handle=MinetGetNextHandle();
01000     con.module=MINET_EXTERNAL;
01001     con.to= outputfd;
01002     con.from= inputfd;
01003 
01004     MyFifos.push_back(con);
01005 
01006     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
01007 
01008     desc.timestamp=Time();
01009     desc.source=MyModuleType;
01010     desc.from=MINET_EXTERNAL;
01011     desc.to=MINET_EXTERNAL;
01012     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
01013     desc.optype=MINET_ACCEPT;
01014 
01015     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
01016 
01017     return con.handle;
01018 }
01019 
01020 int         MinetClose(const MinetHandle &mh)
01021 {
01022     MinetModule mod;
01023     Fifos::iterator x=MyFifos.FindMatching(mh);
01024     if (x!=MyFifos.end())
01025     {
01026         close((*x).from);
01027         close((*x).to);
01028         mod=(*x).module;
01029         MyFifos.erase(x);
01030     }
01031     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
01032 
01033     desc.timestamp=Time();
01034     desc.source=MyModuleType;
01035     desc.from=MyModuleType;
01036     desc.to=mod;
01037     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
01038     desc.optype=MINET_CLOSE;
01039 
01040     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
01041     return 0;
01042 }

01045 
01046 int MinetHandleToInputOutputFDs(const MinetHandle &h, int *inputfd, int *outputfd)
01047 {
01048     for (Fifos::iterator i=MyFifos.begin(); i!=MyFifos.end(); ++i)
01049     {
01050         if ((*i).handle==h)
01051         {
01052             *inputfd=(*i).from;
01053             *outputfd=(*i).to;
01054             return 0;
01055         }
01056     }
01057     return -1;
01058 }
01059 
01060 
01061 int MinetGetNextEvent(MinetEvent &event, double timeout)
01062 {
01063     int maxfd;
01064     fd_set read_fds;
01065     int rc;
01066 
01067     Time doneby(timeout);
01068 
01069 
01070 
01071     while (1)
01072         {
01073         FD_ZERO(&read_fds);
01074         maxfd=-1;
01075         Fifos::iterator i;
01076         for (i=MyFifos.begin(); i!=MyFifos.end(); ++i)
01077         {
01078             FD_SET((*i).from, &read_fds);
01079             maxfd=std::max(maxfd,(*i).from);
01080         }
01081         if (timeout==-1 && maxfd==-1)
01082         {
01083             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("MinetGetNextEvent called without connections or timeout"));
01084             return -1;
01085         }
01086 
01087         if (timeout!=-1)
01088         {
01089             rc = select(maxfd+1, &read_fds,0,0,&doneby);
01090         }
01091         else
01092         {
01093             rc = select(maxfd+1, &read_fds,0,0,0);
01094         }
01095         if (rc<0)
01096         {
01097             if (errno==EINTR)
01098             {
01099                 continue;
01100             }
01101             else
01102             {
01103                 MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("MinetGetNextEvent returning with unknown error"));
01104                 return -1;
01105             }
01106         }
01107         else if (rc==0)
01108         {
01109             event.eventtype=MinetEvent::Timeout;
01110             event.direction=MinetEvent::NONE;
01111             event.handle=MINET_NOHANDLE;
01112             event.error=0;
01113             Time now;
01114             event.overtime=(double)now - (double) doneby;
01115             MinetSendToMonitor(MinetMonitoringEvent("MinetGetNextEvent returning with timeout"));
01116             return 0;
01117         }
01118         else
01119         {
01120             for (Fifos::iterator i=MyFifos.begin(); i!=MyFifos.end(); ++i)
01121             {
01122                 if (FD_ISSET((*i).from, &read_fds))
01123                 {
01124                     event.eventtype=MinetEvent::Dataflow;
01125                     event.direction=MinetEvent::IN;
01126                     event.handle=(*i).handle;
01127                     event.error=0;
01128                     event.overtime=0.0;
01129 
01130                     MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
01131 
01132                     desc.timestamp=Time();
01133                     desc.source=MyModuleType;
01134                     desc.from=(*i).module;
01135                     desc.to=MyModuleType;
01136                     desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
01137                     desc.optype=MINET_GETNEXTEVENT;
01138 
01139                     MinetSendToMonitor(desc);
01140 
01141                     return 0;
01142                 }
01143             }
01144         }
01145     }
01146 }
01147 
01148 #define MINET_IMPL(TYPE, MINETTYPE)                                     \
01149 int MinetMonitorSend(const MinetHandle &handle, const TYPE &obj)        \
01150 {                                                                       \
01151   if ((MyModuleType!=MINET_MONITOR) && (MyMonitorFifo>0)) {             \
01152     Fifos::iterator fifo = MyFifos.FindMatching(handle);                \
01153     if (fifo==MyFifos.end()) {                                          \
01154       return -1;                                                        \
01155     } else {                                                            \
01156       MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;                             \
01157       desc.timestamp=(double)Time();                                    \
01158       desc.source=MyModuleType;                                         \
01159       desc.from=MyModuleType;                                           \
01160       desc.to=(*fifo).module;                                           \
01161       desc.datatype = MINETTYPE;                                        \
01162       desc.optype= MINET_SEND;           \
01163       desc.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);                                    \
01164       obj.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);                                     \
01165     }                                                                   \
01166     return 0;                                                           \
01167   } else {                                                              \
01168     return 0;                                                           \
01169   }                                                                     \
01170 }                                                                       \
01171 int MinetMonitorReceive(const MinetHandle &handle, TYPE &obj)   \
01172 {                                                                       \
01173   if ((MyModuleType!=MINET_MONITOR) && (MyMonitorFifo>0)) {             \
01174     Fifos::iterator fifo = MyFifos.FindMatching(handle);                \
01175     if (fifo==MyFifos.end()) {                                          \
01176       return -1;                                                        \
01177     } else {                                                            \
01178       MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;                             \
01179       desc.timestamp=(double)Time();                                    \
01180       desc.source=MyModuleType;                                         \
01181       desc.from=MyModuleType;                                           \
01182       desc.to=(*fifo).module;                                           \
01183       desc.datatype = MINETTYPE;                                        \
01184       desc.optype= MINET_RECEIVE;                                       \
01185       desc.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);                                    \
01186       obj.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);                                     \
01187     }                                                                   \
01188     return 0;                                                           \
01189   } else {                                                              \
01190     return 0;                                                           \
01191   }                                                             \
01192 }                                                               \
01193 int MinetSend(const MinetHandle &handle, const TYPE &object)    \
01194 {                                                               \
01195   if (MinetMonitorSend(handle,object)) {                        \
01196     return -1;                                                  \
01197   } else {                                                      \
01198     Fifos::iterator fifo=MyFifos.FindMatching(handle);          \
01199     if (fifo==MyFifos.end()) {                                  \
01200       return -1;                                                \
01201     } else {                                                    \
01202       object.Serialize((*fifo).to);                             \
01203     }                                                           \
01204     return 0;                                                   \
01205   }                                                             \
01206 };                                                              \
01207 int MinetReceive(const MinetHandle &handle, TYPE &object)       \
01208 {                                                               \
01209   Fifos::iterator fifo=MyFifos.FindMatching(handle);            \
01210   if (fifo==MyFifos.end()) {                                    \
01211     return -1;                                                  \
01212   } else {                                                      \
01213     object.Unserialize((*fifo).from);                           \
01214     if (MinetMonitorReceive(handle,object)) {                   \
01215       return -1;                                                \
01216     } else {                                                    \
01217       return 0;                                                 \
01218     }                                                           \
01219   }                                                             \
01220 };

01232 
01233 int MinetSendToMonitor(const MinetMonitoringEvent &obj)
01234 {
01235     if (MyMonitorFifo>0)
01236     {
01237         MinetMonitoringEventDescription desc;
01238         desc.timestamp=Time();
01239         desc.source=MyModuleType;
01240         desc.from=MyModuleType;
01241         desc.to=MINET_MONITOR;
01242         desc.datatype=MINET_MONITORINGEVENT;
01243         desc.optype=MINET_SENDTOMONITOR;
01244         desc.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);
01245         obj.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);
01246         return 0;
01247     }
01248     else
01249     {
01250         return 0;
01251     }
01252 }
01253 
01254 
01255 int MinetSendToMonitor(const MinetMonitoringEventDescription &desc, const MinetMonitoringEvent &obj) {
01256     if (MyMonitorFifo > 0) {
01257         desc.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);
01258         obj.Serialize(MyMonitorFifo);
01259     } 
01260 
01261     return 0;
01262 }
